Present Simple vs Present Continuous

Слова-маркеры:

Если рядом с глаголом есть следующие слова, то выбор времени упрощается.

  • Present Simple
    • always
    • every
    • often
    • normally
    • usually
    • sometimes
    • seldom
    • never
    • first
    • then
  • Present Continuous
    • at the moment
    • today
    • now
    • right now
    • Listen!
    • Look!
See more

Put the verb into the correct tense

Start

Exercise 2

Complete the sentences. Use Present Simple or Present Continuous.

Start

Exercise 3

Complete the negative sentences. Use Present Simple or Present Continuous.

Start

Complete the sentences. Use Present Simple or Present Continuous.
